title: Region Transfer not available in my store?
body:
I just moved to the UK and would like to transfer my region on my account, however the only item available under 'Account' in Store is a Summoner Name Change.

I asked my friend to see if he has a Region Transfer and yes he does, to every server he would like

My account is on OCE
My friends account is on EU

Can this be the case? Has the Region Transfer been disabled temporarily or something?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Yup! Transfers out of Oceania are disabled until November 21st, unfortunately. You can read more about this downtime here:

> TL;DR - From the beginning of patch 7.18 (tomorrow morning, 14th Sep), transfers from OCE to other regions will need to be disabled until November 21st as we launch Emotes and then prepare for preseason. For the first month, you may still transfer by submitting a ticket to support. Read on for details.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/eylRc8AL-important-notice-transfers-disabled-from-sep-14th-to-nov-21st
Same here... I just moved to Canada and I want to transfer my OCE account to NA but the transfer service is not available in my store. That's quite problematic...

I can understand that you might be a bit confused about where the heck the transfer feature went. Hopefully, I can provide some clarity on the issue! Here are the latest details on the transfer downtime:

> TL;DR - From the beginning of patch 7.18 (tomorrow morning, 14th Sep), transfers from OCE to other regions will need to be disabled until November 21st as we launch Emotes and then prepare for preseason. For the first month, you may still transfer by submitting a ticket to support. Read on for details.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/eylRc8AL-important-notice-transfers-disabled-from-sep-14th-to-nov-21st
